head.title: Lori Mendelsohn Weds B. J. Meek

hedline.hl1: Lori Mendelsohn Weds B. J. Meek

block.p: LEAD: The marriage of Lori Fran Mendelsohn, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Michael Mendelsohn of Tampa, Fla., to Brian Joseph Meek, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Philip J. Meek of Greenwich, Conn., took place yesterday. The Rev. Richard D. LEAD: The marriage of Lori Fran Mendelsohn, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Michael Mendelsohn of Tampa, Fla., to Brian Joseph Meek, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Philip J. Meek of Greenwich, Conn., took place yesterday. The Rev. Richard D. Bingham, a minister of the United Methodist Church, and Rabbi Samuel Silver performed the ceremony in the Dome Room of the Main Building at the University of Tampa, where the bride's father is a professor of

The marriage of Lori Fran Mendelsohn, a daughter of Mr. and Mrs. Michael Mendelsohn of Tampa, Fla., to Brian Joseph Meek, the son of Mr. and Mrs. Philip J. Meek of Greenwich, Conn., took place yesterday. The Rev. Richard D. Bingham, a minister of the United Methodist Church, and Rabbi Samuel Silver performed the ceremony in the Dome Room of the Main Building at the University of Tampa, where the bride's father is a professor of English.
Mrs. Meek is an assistant manager of the Hyatt Regency Hotel in Chicago, where her husband is a commercial loan associate for the Boulevard National Bank. They both graduated from Colorado College.

The bridegroom's father is a senior vice president of Capital Cities/ABC Inc. and president of its publishing division and of Fairchild Publications. He is a former president and publisher of The Fort Worth Star-Telegram.
